short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Multiple themes available for WhatsApp web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your WhatsApp Web with a variety of themes to match your mood or style! Whether you prefer a sleek Dark mode, a thrilling Batman theme, a futuristic Matrix look, a soft Pastel palette, or a magical Princess theme, WhatsStyle has you covered. With our easy-to-use extension, you can instantly modify the appearance of WhatsApp Web, making your chats not just functional, but visually stunning.

Take control of your messaging experience and switch between themes effortlessly. WhatsStyle allows you to personalize WhatsApp Web in a way that reflects your unique personality, making every conversation more enjoyable. Say goodbye to the plain old look and hello to a world of customization!
